str2: Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Present Optative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To lead, guide; met: I instruct, teach. From hodegos; to show the way (teach).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.
From philos and hippos; fond of horses; Philippus, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To go up, mount, ascend; of things: I rise, spring up, come up. From ana and the base of basis; to go up.
Another form for kathezomai; to seat down, i.e. Set; intransitively, to sit; figuratively, to settle.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
